front.title: Clearance and CA Clearance Constraints Certificate Extensions

abstract.t: This document defines the syntax and semantics for the Clearance and the Certification Authority (CA) Clearance Constraints X.509 certificate extensions. The Clearance certificate extension is used to indicate the clearance held by the subject. The CA Clearance Constraints certificate extension values in a Trust Anchor (TA) and the CAs in a certification path constrain the effective Clearance of the subject of the last certificate in the certification path.
